metadata.title: The Adventures of the Darrington Brigade

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Holy shit, this is too many people, and I am wearing single layer Depends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be a fun, crazy, silly adventure and I'm excited to throw these guys in the middle of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just-- [cheering] I just wanted to say thank you so much for welcoming us to Texas and in front of you guys as my witness, I want to officially pledge my loyalty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [cheering] (laughter) Yep. My new heroes are, and I might be pronouncing these wrong, Tony Ramo, Dede Saunders, and Larry Ellen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only took almost four years to wear him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering] (bubbling) (thunder rumbling) (explosion) ♪ Role! Critical! ♪ ♪ Role! Critical! ♪ ♪ Role! Critical! ♪ ♪ Role! Critical! ♪ ♪ Role! Critical! ♪ ♪ Role! Critical! ♪ ♪ Role! Critical! ♪ ♪ Role! Critical! ♪ ♪ The adventure begins they were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends and the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware 'cause you're 'bout to be dead ♪ [cheering] ♪ They got magic and flair they got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there there's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands, take a chance, ♪ ♪ roll the dice ♪ [cheering] ♪ Can you answer the call dig in deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds now it's your turn ♪ ♪ Your turn, your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (flames whooshing) [cheering] (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you would like to describe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! What they see is a living legend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His face looks a little younger than it should because, side note, a few days ago, he gave some aid to a cattle farmer in exchange for a bovine toxin, which he injected into his forehead and lips to give himself a little bit of a younger appearance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He quickly rushes up with a set of keys and unlocks the gates to the manor before shouting, "Presenting Sir Taryon Darrington, master of the house and founder of the Darrington Brigade. Welcome." (applause)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter] Our adventures are known far and wide in my best selling book, copies of which Lawrence will gladly sell you in the gift shop later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You there next to The Owlbear, who are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I actually didn't know you were for nonprofit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So there will be no profit here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the reason I wanted the treasure was for good of mankind or maybe just for the good of maybe my mankind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I don't make the rules.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (brassy, old time radio announcer) How do you feel about licensing and copyright agreements?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter] I'm interested in that, but more about--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll put a pin in that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything else we should know about you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's some amazing ink you've got there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But, as I was reading, I thought: What if the other world could hear about these magical tales and adventures through an audio recording?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is an audio recording? I write my books down on paper, like anyone else should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure you've heard of my books: The Man Who Should Be King.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, that was a good one, not your best.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Blonde, The Brave And The Bold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon Darrington and The Half Blood Prince.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the Copperpot Crank Action Audiomatic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it can record the human voice, you say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you demonstrate this weird contraption?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why, yes, yes I can. You see, I would like to make you a pitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was The Turbulent Trials Of Taryon Darrington and His Adventures of Vox Machina.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Suddenly, the little elf girl exclaimed-- "Tary! Look out!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you see, as incredible as I was able to make your totally accurate recounting of fighting the dragon sound--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: so if you would have me, I would love to go with you in your exploits and capture the battle live.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An audio recording of me live, in battle, winning hearts and minds?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that's a lot to think about, I already have a biographer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [laughter] But it appears to be paying very close attention to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please, I am just bringing this incredible story to a different medium.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about over here? You folks, you lot, who are you on the end there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, can I just say, that was pretty fucking cool? [laughter] Yeah, I've seen a lot of shit in my day, and I've never seen anything like that, that was pretty fucking cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why thank you, thank you young...lady?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We kind of deal with things a little underneath it all, you know? If you haven't heard of us then we're probably doing it right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you spies of some sort?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, yeah, I mean if you need something, we can get it for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're dipping your feet into--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So Damian is half-elven, very tall, flaming orange hair, wearing a maroon suit, has two stilettos and the hilt of each, are brass knuckles.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Across her neck she has a tattoo that says "never forget." [laughter]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next to Damian, who do we have there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Buddy is a very special ogre.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm over here, can you not see me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Buddy, to the right, to the right!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what? Here at the Darrington Brigade, we have all sorts of implements, tools, equipment engineered by yours truly, and maybe I could hook you up with something that could help you see a little bit better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi, sorry, I didn't realize we were having guests here."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did I do it right, did I do it okay?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did just fine. He also speaks fluent Duck, if you ever need that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you hear about the Darrington Brigade auditions?

lines.name: B
lines.text: On a magical message delivered by a hag,

lines.name: C
lines.text: From a flyer posted around the continent?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: C, so it was the flyers, then. Excellent job, Doty, money well spent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, congratulations on taking the first step in your new career. We in the brigade do more by 9:00am than most people do by 10:00am! Small disclaimer, I want to make sure that you are all very aware of the nonprofit nature of the group, right? You've got that, we're all on board? Excellent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But intellectual property rights, we can discuss--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A stipend might be a way to go or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lionel, I will let you take it over from here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You got it, boss. All right, so first we got to get you wearing some of our officially branded materials here and then we're going to throw you in the pit and see what you got."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we have a warehouse over here with some of my experiments and developments that aren't quite done or have been used and discarded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes around and starts grabbing all sorts of shields and objects and items and manages to find that pair of goggles he requested. He goes, "I think these should fit your face pretty good."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are very special goggles that should let you see very keenly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, that fellow on your back, was it Mac?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It looks like awkward bench seating you've got up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's not very stable, but it's the best way I can steer him in the right direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My foot, he's crushing my foot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was a chariot I was developing for a while imbued with electronic powers, but I never really finished it. Lionel, do you think we could retrofit it for the ogre there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still a little rickety, but you put it on and it actually fits pretty nice. It has these little blue crystals that are affixed to the bottom of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This, much like every single other piece of equipment you've acquired, are all very brightly branded with the Darrington Brigade logo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that suit you well? Does it fit your hunchy back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll take that as a yes. Anyone else need any items, anything to help you in the battles ahead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lionel looks over and goes, "So boss, should we take them outside to do the initiation?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be fun."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asks you all to line up and goes, "All right, so as it is required as members of the Darrington Brigade, you must follow the initiation rite of which was learned by his time being initiated into Vox Machina." [cheering]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, you're a fucking Owlbear, go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, stand in the pit."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty brings out a plate of figs for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see The Owlbear step out and look at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to reach out with my flame hand and smack him in the middle of the chest, Stunning Strike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have to say I'm going to Stunning Strike right from when I hit or do I just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can say it once you've hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a constitution saving throw, Owlbear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that do, what does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're making your second attack, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Second attack, I'm going to Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to still roll damage on these hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I haven't been rolling damage!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 10 on the first one, five on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw for a second Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a failure. You are now stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to do anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I'm going to Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, two more attacks, both of these attacks with advantage because he is stunned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: First attack, hits, second attack, definitely hits, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13 points of damage for the Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it's the end of my next turn, so I get to go again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your vision blurs before you take a whole 'nother series of attacks, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, for this next one, I'm going to spend another ki point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, you know, I could dodge maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, I still get advantage because you're still stunned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, how do I miss him when he's stunned?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I smell kind of bad, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to spend a ki point and invoke my Fangs of the Fire Snake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [laughter] Okay, so I'm going to hit him regular and then, woo! Then I do flame damage. Oh, that's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to spend another ki point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit! What the fuck, man?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight plus one so nine points of fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nein points of fire damage and then while he's stunned, I'm going to back up my entire movement which is what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At 10th level, it should be around 50 feet, I believe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Around 50 feet, yes I'm going to back up 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Owlbear, it's your turn. You come back, you're sore, you've been battered in various places of your body and you watch as this same figure just shunts back about 50 feet from you. What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am, first of all, going to rage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (roars) I am going to move my full 40 feet towards-- (laughs) Towards you, which is not quite close enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe I can add movement with my bonus action, I think I can, I have a dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used your bonus action to go into a rage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I'm going to circle around at 20 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to throw two daggers. I'm going to-- Can I get advantage on this, or does that have to be a close-up strike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you're raging, it's strength-based, then you can get the advantage on that if you do reckless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For a thrown, I can do strength, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm going to take advantage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to reckless on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you do reckless, it's for the full round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's a negative five to strike, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would've been 20 to hit. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits. So that's 1d8 plus I'm going to take my sneak attack damage because I have advantage against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Think about it, think about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's eight points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I am 20 feet away from you and raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Farriwen, it's your turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a reminder, you can deflect missiles if they come at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it is your turn, so what do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's my first time being a monk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, then I'm going to-- wait, hold on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I forgot that, we're even.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Screw it, I'm going to try to run forward and hit him again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get advantage because he was advantage, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ha! Oh shit, that doesn't hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try, wait, hold on, let me see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll your damage and then you make a constitution saving throw, Owlbear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have advantage on constitution saving throws because I'm raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that rage is a mother, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you have your bonus action, Farriwen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, take this down: Monks are overpowered as shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Flurry of Blows. Can you do two things with ki points in one turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Use as many as you like, honey bun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to spend a ki point to Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's 10 points plus eight points of fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's only nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's almost like the totem's half his name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just nine points, that's fi-- I'm unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to levitate up in the air and take a bow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Lionel, what do you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think we should maybe consider her."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Taryon, you know, I'm more of a support person, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so you're up next and--" [laughter] "Ogre." [laughter] [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, yes, you're ... big! Quite large, yes, you are. Hello!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Hazel, you're up first. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sings circus music) (blows tiny kazoo) And I cast Confusion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you could go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You cannot take reactions, and you have to roll a d10 at the start of each round to determine your behavior.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you staying put or are you moving away, Hazel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, Buddy, roll a d10 for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what, I don't quite know, big guy, but I am quite sorry! And I take out another cylinder and I slap it in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [sleigh bells ringing] And out of my horn, I cast Color Spray at Buddy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, Buddy is now wearing large, coke bottle glasses that make his eyes look abnormally large.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hazel, what level are you casting it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to cast it at third "leviel."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's how they talked in the old days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that should mean that I'm doing 10d10 damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you roll 10d10 to see how many hit points of creatures you can affect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, 21, 26, that was, so I need to roll four more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not damage, that is how many hit points of creatures it can affect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 39 hit points that will solely affect Buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Buddy, do you have more than 39 hit points, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has no effect on him, unfortunately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a much tough-- [laughter] - a much tougher ogre than those you might be used to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Better to get that out now than later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even if he was hit by it, does that mean he's still blinded by it, or no, not at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It unfortunately, it only affects up to a certain number of hit points of creatures.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [laughter] You have to surpass my hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [laughter] The colors are so bright and so beautiful in ways you've never seen before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a weapon at all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm a bard in a one man band suit! [laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to run up and with my cymbals, I'm going to go (crashing) and I'm going to crash and I'm going to do Shatter right across--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3rd-level? All righty, Buddy, I need you to make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and so you moved up close to Buddy, are you going to move back or stay right there in the fray?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, finishing back, she's about--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away is she? What's your movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You moved up to do Shatter and then moved back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm probably like 50 feet back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the range on Shatter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So yeah, so you don't have to be that close for that, we'll say since she said it, 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll a d10 for me, Buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, at the end of your turns, you have a saving throw, I forgot about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll another saving throw for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll flash my genius at him and give him a plus four to that roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17 for the Confusion? 17 is what you need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now, the spell fades, you have control.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He slowly swings his head over to Macaroni and says: I thought we were here to make friends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He starts running towards the dwarf and after 10 feet, leaps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to be friends, I want to be friends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a pyramid, how did it get cocked? [laughter] 13 points of damage, and I'm going to use action surge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on it because you are fighting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, are you doing anything else on your turn? Stay put?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [laughter] I would like to move away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and I swing at her twice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (scared noise) The first one is a 26.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, you didn't understand what he said? [laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to say, you know I really like your new goggles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I throw in another wax cylinder and then I crank it up and-- (sings "Toccata in D Minor") [laughter] And I cast Blindness on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go and make a constitution saving throw for me, Buddy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hazel will cast Healing Word on herself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's been a monk for a while, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will-- [laughter] Continue to be pummeled by Buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hazel, you can end this, you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?! No, you never set up any parameters!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I realize there could've been more rules to this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, no, she's actually telling the truth there, boss, we didn't put it a lot of specification to this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you want to end this, just say the word, we'll tap you out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That feels like a cop out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did come prepared with a nice presentay-tion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, Buddy, and I give a Healing Word to Buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Well, that's the very definition of team work then, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, you're right, I am very generous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you give one to Owlbear? He's still unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god! Did he die? Is he dead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I heal nine hit points to the dead Owlbear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like to think that Confusion spell worked quite nicely, but you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Buddy reaches out to shake her hand and sees it for the first time in between his thumb and his forefinger and goes, We are friends. Hi!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [laughter] Also, if you are looking for a manager or representation-- [laughter] Just, I'll give you my card.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey lady, get your own ogre.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, so we have Damian and Macaroni, was it?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, if I can have Mac and Damian, go ahead and roll initiative for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pulling the stilettos from your sheaths, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to produce flames from one of these swords.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: [laughter] And now I'm going to attack Macaroni.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, you okay there, little man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion) (laughter) A column of divine fire bursts from the ground beneath Damian.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Light them up baby, woo! [laughter] [cheering] I need you to make a dexterity 15 saving roll.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to use Indomitable for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's 8d6 fire and radiant damage halved, so go ahead and roll that up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that's 25 points of fire damage, reduced to 12 and 23 points of radiant damage, reduced to, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He looks at you and goes: Bring it on!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what, I'm going to make this fight a little more fair, yeah? I'm going to bonus action cast Giant Might on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as she takes her finger and draws this rune across the front of the suit that's she is wearing and as she finishes up this rune, in but a split second of the eye, her body grows to near twice its size.

lines.name: ASHLEY
